name: Floppy Disk (F1R3CPU Studios)
description:
Description

Floppy Disk is a game inspired by the original game "Flappy Bird". The classic game is a bird that jumps and pass through pipes. But this game there is a literal floppy disk jumping and passing through pipes!

This is F1R3CPU Studios' first creation using Unity.

This game is a 2D game that includes a simple menu and a simple but smooth gameplay, loading screen and transitions.

How the Game works?

Each time the disk hits a pipe, the top or the button you will lose. You have two choices if play again or go back to main menu.

The game is set to a HIGH SPEED, so every jump has to be well timed and you better have quick reactions.

Controls

Jump: SPACEBAR

Changelog

v1.0.0 Full Release (Coming 16th March)

Download Guide

-Download the zip file

-Right click the zip file and select "Extract all"

-Open the file "Floppy Disk"  Application

*Note: DO NOT delete the other files or the game will not work.

If you need more help extracting the file,  check out this page for more detailed instructions for each Operative System: https://www.wikihow.com/Unzip-a-File

Extra

Recommendation: Resize the window (make it smaller), do not play on Fullscreen.

Feel free to share your opinion down in the comments, as long there is respect.

If you want to share your support to F1R3CPU Studios feel free to donate any amount.
